---
title: "test df nested lists"
output: pdf_notebook
---



```{r}

df <- data.frame(n = c(1,2,3),
                 ff = c(2.3, 4.5, 6.7),
                 csd = list(c(1,2,3), c(4,5,6), c(7,8,9)))

 

library(tidyverse)

df %>% 
  rowwise() %>% 
  mutate(csd_list = csd[[1]]) %>% 
  print("this is the list") %>% 
  print(csd_list)
```
